sniffl config show
------------------

Show current configuration

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Display the current configuration values.

::

  sniffl config show [flags]

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for show

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.sniffl.yaml)
